item.description:
KOXC is 89 nm and the 121 at Oxford is fine dining on the ramp. Last year at least six planes flew down and caught everyone's attention, including Bradley approach and the tower at OXC. Bring a friend/spouse - there may even be some music with our dining. Parking is available for about four planes at the restaurant, and the FBO will shuttle the rest of us. Don't miss this one!

Check out the menu at 121 Restaurant

Field Elevation: 726 CTAF/Tower: 118.475 FUEL: 100LLA
Runway: 18/36 length: 5800x100
FBO KeyAir 122.95

or visit AirNav - KOXC for more airport information

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: Waterbury-Oxford Upscale 121 Restaurant!! (Revised)
